correct_order: The railway is a good invention, but there is only wood railway on the beginning.
The railway can save time and money.
Later on, someone invented a new wagon.
With the industrial development, steel railway was invented in the year***, which then replaced wood railway.

sources: The railway is a good invention, but there is only wood railway on the beginning.
Later on, someone invented a new wagon.
With the industrial development, steel railway was invented in the year***, which then replaced wood railway.
The railway can save time and money.
